verses.verse: <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> <S%H6213>there.<s%> Make there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to you when you <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> your <S%H251>brother.<s%>"

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1004>household,<s%> and to all who were with <S%H5493>him,<s%> "Put away the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> that are among <S%H8432>you,<s%> <S%H2891>purify<s%> <S%H2498>yourselves,<s%> change your <S%H8071>garments.<s%>

Let us <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> there an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to <S%H410>God,<s%> who <S%H6030>answered<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>distress,<s%> and was with me in the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H1980>went.<s%>"

They <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> all the <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> which were in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and the <S%H5141>rings<s%> which were in their <S%H241>ears;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2934>hid<s%> them under the <S%H424>oak<s%> which was by <S%H7927>Shechem.<s%>

They <S%H5265>traveled,<s%> and a <S%H2847>terror<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was on the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that were around <S%H5439>them,<s%> and they <S%H7291>didn't<s%> pursue <S%H310>the<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz<s%> (that <S%H1008>is,<s%> Bethel), which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> he and all the people who were with <S%H5971>him.<s%>

He <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7121>there,<s%> and called the <S%H4725>place<s%> El Beth <S%H416>El;<s%> because there <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to <S%H1272>him,<s%> when he fled from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

<S%H1683>Deborah,<s%> <S%H7259>Rebekah<s%>'s <S%H3243>nurse,<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and she was <S%H6912>buried<s%> below <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> under the <S%H437>oak;<s%> and its <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> Allon <S%H439>Bacuth.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>again,<s%> when he came from Paddan <S%H6307>Aram,<s%> and blessed <S%H1288>him.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8034>him,<s%> "Your name is <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> Your <S%H8034>name<s%> shall not be <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> any <S%H8034>more,<s%> but your name <S%H7121>will<s%> be <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>" He <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H410>him,<s%> "I am God <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%> Be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply.<s%> A <S%H1471>nation<s%> and a <S%H6951>company<s%> of <S%H1471>nations<s%> will be from <S%H4428>you,<s%> and kings will <S%H3318>come<s%> out of your <S%H2504>body.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> I will give <S%H5414>it<s%> to <S%H2233>you,<s%> and to your seed after <S%H310>you<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>"
<S%H430>God<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from him in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he spoke with <S%H1696>him.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> set <S%H5324>up<s%> a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H4678>him,<s%> a pillar of <S%H68>stone.<s%> He <S%H5258>poured<s%> out a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> on <S%H3332>it,<s%> and poured oil on <S%H8081>it.<s%>
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H1008>him<s%> "Bethel."

They <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%> There was <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H3530>some<s%> <S%H776>distance<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath,<s%> and <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H3205>travailed.<s%> She had <S%H7185>hard<s%> <S%H3205>labor.<s%>
When she was in <S%H7185>hard<s%> <S%H3205>labor,<s%> the <S%H3205>midwife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3372>her,<s%> "Don't be afraid, for now you will have another <S%H1121>son.<s%>"

It <S%H5315>happened,<s%> as her soul was <S%H3318>departing<s%> (for she <S%H4191>died<s%>), that she <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H7121>him<s%> <S%H1126>Benoni,<s%> but his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> him <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
<S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H672>Ephrath<s%> (the same is <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%>).
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> up a <S%H4676>pillar<s%> on her <S%H6900>grave.<s%> The same is the <S%H4678>Pillar<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>'s <S%H6900>grave<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled,<s%> and <S%H5186>spread<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H4029>Eder.<s%>

It <S%H3478>happened,<s%> while Israel <S%H7931>lived<s%> in that <S%H776>land,<s%> that <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H1121>it.<s%> Now the sons of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah:<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H3290>(Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>), <S%H8095>Simeon,<s%> <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3485>Issachar,<s%> and <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel:<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%> <S%H7354>(Rachel<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>): <S%H1835>Dan<s%> and <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%> <S%H3812>(Leah<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid<s%>): <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H836>Asher.<s%> These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in Paddan <S%H6307>Aram.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> to <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> to Kiriath <S%H7153>Arba<s%> (which is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>), where <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> lived as <S%H1481>foreigners.<s%>
The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> were one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>spirit,<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H7649>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days.<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> buried <S%H6912>him.<s%>
